item.title: Fear
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded:
EMANUEL: It's amazing. Six years of a Republican majority in the White House, the House and the Senate, and all you've got is fear. The fact is, there will be a change. We'd have a middle-class tax cut. We'd have an increase in the minimum wage. Let me just go through it. I gave youâ€¦
